attributes.action: Urgently take steps to prevent Covid variants entering the UK
attributes.additional_details: Do not repeat the 2019 mistake allowing massive infected travellers entering the UK
attributes.background: Adopt measures to ensure people entering the UK are not infected by any variants of covid.  We have worked so hard to return to the current state of recovery, another wave of covid attack will destroy our economy completely.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the prospect of new Covid-19 variants entering the UK, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to prevent this.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
